bill.title: Bureau of Conveyances; Counties; Recorded Instruments
bill.description: Requires the registrar of the bureau of conveyances to provide, within 10 days and free of charge, an image and index of all instruments that contain real property transactions each week to the administrator of the real property division of a county, to be agreed upon in a memorandum of understanding among the counties. Effective date 1/1/46. (SD1)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to WLO, JUD, referral sheet 2
(H) Re-referred to WLO, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 6
(H) Re-referred to JUD, FIN, referral sheet 11
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Friday, 02-13-09 2:20PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Karamatsu, Ito, Belatti, Cabanilla, Luke, Mizuno, B. Oshiro, Souki, Tsuji; Ayes with reservations: Marumoto; 1 Noes: Thielen; and 5 Excused: Carroll, Herkes, McKelvey, Morita, Wakai.
(H) Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 591) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting no (0) and Bertram, McKelvey, Takai, Takumi, Tokioka excused (5).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Wednesday, 03-04-09 11:30AM in House conference room 308.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) M. Oshiro, M. Lee, Aquino, Awana, Brower, Choy, Coffman, Har, Keith-Agaran, C. Lee, Nishimoto, Sagum, Tokioka, Wooley, Yamashita, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Pine.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 817), recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Passed Third Reading with Representative(s) Thielen voting no (1) and Representative(s) Takai excused (1). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 73).
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to CPN/TIA, WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on CPN/TIA has scheduled a public hearing on 03-23-09 1:15pm in conference room 224.

(S) The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPN were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Ige, Espero; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Hemmings; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Green, Ihara, Sakamoto.

(S) The committee(s) on TIA recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in TIA were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) English, Gabbard, Espero, Nishihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Slom.
(S) Reported from CPN/TIA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 958) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
Carried over to 2010 Regular Session.
